name: digital-habit-tracker
description: A Digital Habit Tracker with Gamification features including streak counters, motivational quotes, heatmap visualizations, and system notifications

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/.next frontend/out backend/dist shared/dist node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules

author: ravi-cheetiralaav
